paragraphs: Hi! I'm Jeremy Lo. I'm a front end software developer that specializes in JS, CSS, Python, and recently TypeScript. I also have a secondary interest in automation via Jenkins and Python.

Currently, I work at Electronic Arts, but my previous experience includes Tantalus Systems and BlackBerry. I help our FIFA Companion App designers take their features through every stage, from researching estimates to practical implementation. Because the app regularly pushes updates on Android, iOS, and web, I mantain my team's relationship with the live services group and participate in collaborative bug fixing.

I am driven to solve problems by improving code maintainability and eliminating tech debt. My ideal work environment is one where I can challenge myself to constantly improve. Right now, I am currently diving into TypeScript.
So if you need something built, I build things. Like this site, which I built with React and a bit of free time. Thanks for visiting!
